name: Angular-node-socket.io-chat-app
tagline: This is simple chat application developed with AngularJS, NodeJS, Express And Socket.io
body:
### Welcome to Nik's World.

This is simple chat application.
Just clone the repository and run below command in your terminal.

```
$ node app.js
```

## Functionalities

***

* Login functionality
* Broadcast message to all users
* Private message
* Track login/logout users
* Twitter bootstrap design

***

Enjoy Coding!!!

Love Nikhilchandra Rathod
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
